oh there are a bunch more picts! I love
Pam's, HP day!!!!

> little sister kiss was so
> sweet.

thank you! I loev that picture too.

>
> What a bunch of really cute kids though.
> Maybe it's that happy,
> carefree glow that comes from being
> unschoolers?

I think so.

>
> I think so.
> How do I post a pic?

just have it on your computer, then go to
add photo, and then click browse, find where
it's stored and click on it, type a caption,
and you are done!

Joylyn

> I hate for anyone to see my handwriting
> still.
> All those years of being shamed for my bad
> penmanship are still with
> me I guess...how dumb.
> Ren

messages.subject: The photos
messages.msgSnippet: I just looked at all the photographs you guys posted!! How awesome. It s so great to put faces with some of the names finally. I vote Janene s as the cutest
messages.messageBody:
I just looked at all the photographs you guys posted!! How awesome.
It's so great to put faces with some of the names finally.
I vote Janene's as the cutest photo....that little sister kiss was so
sweet.
What a bunch of really cute kids though. Maybe it's that happy,
carefree glow that comes from being unschoolers?
I think so.
How do I post a pic? I need to do one of our whole family, we're a
bit behind on doing that. I have to put them on disk first as we
don't have a scanner or digital camera.
How fun.
Thanks for breaking the ice on posting your handwriting Dan...maybe
I'll get up the courage to do it.
I hate for anyone to see my handwriting still.
All those years of being shamed for my bad penmanship are still with
me I guess...how dumb.
Ren
